category.title: Internals Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to mobilize the volunteers, assist the executive directors in overseeing the overall progress of the team, ensure that all deliverables are covered, and other related tasks.

category.title: Externals Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to contact and coordinate with the event's roster of speakers, accommodate their needs, and assist them throughout the duration of the event, and other related tasks.

category.title: Secretariat Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to create different documents needed in mobilizing the event, coordinate with different committees regarding the documents they need, mobilize reservation efforts, and handle email concerns, other related tasks.

category.title: Finance Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to spearhead the making of the budget proposal, create liquidation reports and other budget-related documents, oversee the inflow and outflow of money used for the event, and other related tasks.

category.title: Communications Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to create posting-related captions, co-create the event’s PR scheme, spearhead email blast efforts, and other related tasks.

category.title: Publicity and Promotions Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to oversee the overall social media presence of MISSCON 2025, create marketing strategies for the event, co-create the event’s PR scheme, and other related tasks.

members.name: Precious Mebrano
members.position: Assistant VP for Publicity and Promotions

category.title: Sponsorships Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to contact partner organizations within AdDU, connect with partner schools and universities, secure brand and media sponsors, and other related tasks.

category.title: Creatives Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to create the publicity materials that are to be posted in the MISSCON (or AISSO) page, as well as other publicity materials that will be used in related documents, be involved in the making of the event’s PR scheme, and other related tasks.

members.name: Audrey Bianca Ramiso
members.position: Assistant VP for Graphics and Branding

members.name: Jabez Ethan Pagaduan
members.position: Assistant VP for Photo and Documentation

category.title: Delegations and Support Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to create the delegates' database, prepare the delegates' modules and kits, prepare other documents in relation to the delegates, and other related tasks.

members.name: Norhanie Guiamadil
members.position: Assistant VP for Delegations and Support (Facilitator)

members.name: Beatrix Marie Ducao
members.position: Assistant VP for Delegations and Support (Member)

category.title: Productions Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to oversee the overall course and flow of the event proper, ensure that all pre-event productions-related documents are made (host script, schedules, etc.), needed equipment are reserved and secured (in coordination with Secretariat), and other related tasks.

category.title: Logistics Committee
category.description: This committee is tasked to procure needed materials (as well as food) for the whole duration of the event, coordinate with other committees regarding needed materials, overall manpower, and other related tasks.
